sql.query:
SELECT COUNT(r_order_details.id) AS CountId
FROM r_order_details
LEFT JOIN m_product AS mp ON (mp.id = r_order_details.prod_id)
WHERE mp.market_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.market}} */ AND mp.status = :P2 /* {{1}} */

SELECT user_id
FROM t_user_log
WHERE login_token = :P1 /* {{$_GET.logintoken}} */ AND login_from = :P2 /* {{'Android'}} */

select COUNT(rod.prod_id) as repeat_times, mp.id as p_id, mp.prod_id, mp.rest_id, mp.prod_mark_id, mp.prod_name_en as prod_name, 
mp.prod_desc_en as prod_description, mp.prod_img1, mr.shop_name_en as shop_name, 
(select array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(q))) from (select rpt.id as price_id, rpt.quantity, rpt.q_unit, rpt.mrp, rpt.selling_price as price, 
rpt.product_tax from r_price_table rpt where rpt.prod_id=mp.id) q) as price, 
coalesce((select rw.prod_id from r_wishlist rw where rw.prod_id is not null and mp.id=rw.prod_id and rw.user_id=@user_id),0) as count_wl,
coalesce((select rc.prod_id from r_cart rc where rc.prod_id is not null and mp.id=rc.prod_id and rc.user_id=@user_id),0) as count_cart, 
coalesce((select avg(rpr.review_value) from r_prod_review rpr where rpr.prod_id = mp.id and rpr.review_value is not null),0) as avg_review 
from r_order_details rod 
JOIN m_product mp ON rod.prod_id = mp.id 
JOIN m_restaurant mr ON mp.rest_id = mr.id 
where rod.order_status = @order_status AND mp.market_id = @market AND mp.status=@prod_status
AND rod.created_on::date >= (NOW()::date- INTERVAL '25 DAY') 
GROUP BY rod.prod_id, mp.id, mr.shop_name_en 
ORDER BY COUNT(rod.prod_id) DESC LIMIT @limit;

select COUNT(rod.prod_id) as repeat_times, mp.id as p_id, mp.prod_id, mp.rest_id, mp.prod_mark_id, mp.prod_name_bn as prod_name, 
mp.prod_desc_bn as prod_description, mp.prod_img1, mr.shop_name_bn as shop_name, 
(select array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(q))) from (select rpt.id as price_id, rpt.quantity, rpt.q_unit, rpt.mrp, rpt.selling_price as price, 
rpt.product_tax from r_price_table rpt where rpt.prod_id=mp.id) q) as price, 
coalesce((select rw.prod_id from r_wishlist rw where rw.prod_id is not null and mp.id=rw.prod_id and rw.user_id=@user_id),0) as count_wl,
coalesce((select rc.prod_id from r_cart rc where rc.prod_id is not null and mp.id=rc.prod_id and rc.user_id=@user_id),0) as count_cart, 
coalesce((select avg(rpr.review_value) from r_prod_review rpr where rpr.prod_id = mp.id and rpr.review_value is not null),0) as avg_review 
from r_order_details rod 
JOIN m_product mp ON rod.prod_id = mp.id 
JOIN m_restaurant mr ON mp.rest_id = mr.id 
where rod.order_status = @order_status AND mp.market_id = @market AND mp.status=@prod_status
AND rod.created_on::date >= (NOW()::date- INTERVAL '25 DAY') 
GROUP BY rod.prod_id, mp.id, mr.shop_name_bn 
ORDER BY COUNT(rod.prod_id) DESC LIMIT @limit;
